verbs.description: [ARG0: peterman] [V: puts] [ARG1: bills] [ARG2: ahead of texans with perfect pass video] the buffalo bills have taken their first lead of week 6 and it came thanks to their quarterback not josh allen but nathan peterman peterman replaced allen at the end of the third quarter when the rookie suffered an elbow injury upon entering the game peterman showed he worthy of his roster spot peterman tossed a perfect pass to zay jones in the corner of the end zone to give buffalo the 13 - 10 lead in the fourth quarter here buffalo bills nathan peterman peterman bills josh allen
